QueryDefinition.Query: select a.patid, a.staffid, a.eventdate, a.prodcode, product.gemscriptcode, round(case when a.qty < 0 then null else a.qty end, 0) qty, ISNULL(case when a.qty < 0 then null else a.qty end, 0) quantity, case when a.numdays = 0 or a.numdays > 365 then null else a.numdays end numdays, cast((cast(a.patid as bigint)*100000000)+(year(a.eventdate) *10000)+ (month(a.eventdate)*100)+ day(a.eventdate) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, a.consid, ISNULL(a.ndd, 0) ndd, ISNULL(a.numpacks, 0) numpacks, right(a.patid,3) as care_site_id from therapy a JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND a.patid = ch.PERSON_ID left outer join Product product on a.prodcode = product.prodcode where a.prodcode > 1 and a.eventdate is not null
